attributes.action: to listen to what the husband or wife tells you about person in hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To encourage the health service and the social workers and the PCT's to REALLY listen to what people want to do about their relatatives in hospital especially if their are disabled.  

The husband or wife really know what the person is like and how best to treat them especially if they have had a long illness and the husband or wife has been talking to another doctor about the illness.
